name: Dokis & Dragons
storyline: Get ready to embark on an adventure in the litera club...I mean D&D club. Here you can meet our wonderful adventurers, Sayori, Monika, Yuri and Natsuki! Join them in the great conquest of a fantastic world! Create your own character and risk falling in love with these girls in D&D! In your conquest, you'll roll dice, face many enemies and take the opportunity to demonstrate your skills! Every step of the way can easily be influenced by fate itself!
summary: Dokis & Dragons is a mod for Doki Doki Literature Club! that mixes the elements of the popular visual novel with a tabletop RPG experience inspired by Dungeons & Dragons. In this mod, players follow the literature club as the characters embark on an RPG campaign full of fantasy, battles and strategic decisions.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: The Doki's Play D&D Together!!!!(DDLC Dokis & Dragons MOD)
